lead_paragraph: Hitler fired a shot in the North Atlantic yesterday and heard an immediate echo. A few hours after the United States destroyer Kearny was struck by a German torpedo in American defensive waters the House of Representatives voted by a majority of nearly two to one to arm American merchant ships.
